Momo Root detector See how apps are detecting Root. What should I put for this? https://github.com/Luphaestus/VulcanUpdate/raw/main/Apps/momo.apk
Pixlify GPhotos LSPosed / EdXposed module to add Google Pixel features on Google Photos for any device.
1. Install a Ksu Kernel (See twrp tab), LSPosed Or EdXposed.\n2. Install the apk of this app (available from Releases page.)\n3. Open LSPosed / EdXposed app and enable the module. For LSPosed, Google Photos will be automatically selected.\n 4. Reboot. Enjoy. (If needed, you might need to clear data of Google Photos app).
https://github.com/Luphaestus/VulcanUpdate/raw/main/Apps/pixelifyGphotos.apk
Steps to use:
